Question 167) The 2014 World Cup organizing committee created the World Cup logo, made up of a flat figure and the slogan “together in one rhythm”, with hands that unite forming the FIFA Cup. Consider that the organizing committee would decide to use all the colors of the national flag (green, yellow, blue and white) to color the logo, so that neighboring regions have different colors.
How many different ways could the World Cup organizing committee paint the logo with the colors mentioned?
A) 15
B) 30
C) 108
D) 360
E) 972
